TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Chain extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Chain extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 证书的链生成引擎。

span.span: Represents a chain-building engine for certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象具有一个名为 的全局错误状态，该状态应用于证书验证。The object has a global error status called that should be used for certificate validation. 控制证书验证的规则非常复杂，通过忽略涉及到的一个或多个元素的错误状态，可以轻松地过分简化其中验证逻辑。The rules governing certificate validation are complex, and it is easy to oversimplify the validation logic by ignoring the error status of one or more of the elements involved. 全局错误状态会考虑链中每个元素的状态。The global error status takes into consideration the status of each element in the chain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]开始，此类型实现 接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] 和更早版本的应用程序， 类不实现 接口，因此没有 `Dispose` 方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#1)]

param.name: useMachineContext
param.span: 如果为 ，则使用计算机上下文；如果为 ，则使用当前用户上下文。

span.span: to use the machine context; to use the current user context.

summary.span: 通过指定一个值指示是否应使用计算机上下文，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a value that indicates whether the machine context should be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当未加载用户配置文件并且需要使用计算机上下文时，可以使用此构造函数。This constructor can be used when the user profile is not loaded and the machine context needs to be used. 如果 `useMachineContext` 参数设置为 `true`，则将使用本地计算机上下文（HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE 标志）来创建链。When the `useMachineContext` parameter is set to `true`, the local machine context (HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE flag) is used to create the chain. 如果参数设置为 `false`，则使用当前用户上下文（HCCE_CURRENT_USER 标志）。If the parameter is set to `false`, the current user context (HCCE_CURRENT_USER flag) is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用 所指定的策略生成 X.509 链。

span.span: Builds an X.509 chain using the policy specified in .

returns.span: 如果 X.509 证书有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the X.509 certificate is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，受信任颁发者提供的有效 x.509 证书仅对 对象中指定的使用有效。Note that a valid X.509 certificate from a trusted issuer is valid only for the use specified in the object. 满足这些链策略规则的证书对于具有诸如 Security/MIME （SMIME）、Authenticode 或安全套接字层（SSL）等功能的特定用途可能仍然无效。Certificates that meet these chain policy rules might still be invalid for specific uses with such features as Security/MIME (SMIME), Authenticode, or Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). 如果需要进一步的处理来确定证书对于特定策略是否有效，请从 中派生一个类，然后重写 方法，以便它先调用基类 `Build` 方法，然后执行其他处理。If further processing is required to determine whether the certificate is valid for a specific policy, derive a class from and override the method so that it calls the base class `Build` method first, and then does the additional processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性返回与非托管的 Microsoft 加密 API （CAPI）兼容的句柄。Use this property to return a handle that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChainElements As X509ChainElementCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets a collection of objects.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 对象都是链中某个元素的表示形式，该元素在调用 方法的过程中生成。Each object is a representation of an element in the chain that was built during a call to the method. 链元素包含一个 对象、一个 结构和一个额外的信息字符串（仅适用于 Windows XP 平台）。A chain element consists of an object, an structure, and an extra information string (available only on Windows XP platforms). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ ChainPolicy { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置生成 X.509 证书链时要使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when building an X.509 certificate chain.

value.span: 与此 X.509 链关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with this X.509 chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性设置链策略。Use this property to set chain policy. 例如，可以指定应验证其链的增强型密钥用法（EKU），或指定吊销检查。For example, you can specify the Enhanced Key Usage (EKU) for which the chain should be validated, or specify revocation checking. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于所选的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取有关链状态的详细错误信息。Use this property to get detailed error information for the status of the chain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As X509Chain

summary.span: 查询 CryptoConfig 文件中定义的映射后，创建一个 对象，并将链映射到该映射。

span.span: Creates an object after querying for the mapping defined in the CryptoConfig file, and maps the chain to that mapping.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将创建一个 x.509 链。By default, this method will create an X.509 chain. 当在 Machine.config 文件中重写默认链生成引擎时，还可以使用此方法。You can also use this method when the default chain-building engine is overridden in the Machine.config file. 请注意，为了实现兼容性，任何链引擎都必须尝试服从默认链引擎的调用和返回语义。Note that for compatibility, any chain engine must attempt to honor the call and return semantics of the default chain engine.
